Description: Anyone can introduce a Project Initiation Request.
The main beneficiary of the projectâ€™s outputs usually nominates a Project Owner (PO).
The organisational unit that will carry out the project work nominates a Solution Provider (SP).
Depending on the project, the Project Owner (PO) or a higher-level Appropriate Governance Body (AGB) can accept the Project Initiation Request and authorise work on a more elaborate Business Case.
